name: Francois.io
tagline: A better jenkins, because it's french!
body:
### What is francois?
Francois is the tool you always wanted that helps managing jenkins job configurations. Jenkins doesn't support templating and so you end up copying all your jobs around and modifying them slightly. This makes it really hard to make a change to your build process, because you have to change it everywhere!

### Authors and Contributors
@jakeswenson
